transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Deepak ji good morning sir.
Customer: Very good morning.
Executive: Raju Prajapati bol raha tha IndiaMART se.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Kuch theek hua sir matlab kafi maine changes kiya tha I think calls bhi bade hain aapke.
Customer: Haan theek ho raha hai thoda thoda theek ho raha hai.
Executive: Theek ho raha hai matlab matlab jo kar raha hoon theek ho raha hai na.
Customer: Theek ho raha hai haan theek ho raha hai.
Executive: Okay koi changes karne isme.
Customer: Nahi abhi kuch nahi karna.
Executive: Koi naya product ya fir kuch.
Customer: Na na koi nahi koi kuch koi nahi.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Kuch nahi karna. Ek aapki ek thoda sa bas isme changes ek karna tha jo ki mistake hai aapke side se.
Executive: Ah ek minute thoda sa line par rahenge bas katiyega mat ek second ruk jaiye. 
Customer: Nahi mai to lunch abhi lunch me jane ke liye nikla hoon.
Executive: Achcha lunch pe kitne baje free hote hain aap bata do.
Customer: 12 se 1:30 baje tak mera lunch.
Executive: To 2 baje 3 baje laga loon free ho.
Customer: Dekh le laga lena agar free hoga to baat chit kar lenge.
Executive: Theek hai 3 baje kar lunga.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states he is going for lunch.

- Executive wants to make changes to the account.



Resolution:

- Call will be scheduled at 3 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer at 3 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- follow up, changes, buyleads
